TopicTitle: The Triple Threat: It's 3 space shuttles in one.

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft here: http://d.pr/f/sGEL

Some info: It's single stage to orbit. Carries 3 shuttles with quite a bit of d/v. Less than 100 parts. About 100 tons. When fueled up again it becomes an interplanetary space carrier.
Not bad not my style but not bad
